theme_description: Professional knowledge content display theme that supports converting internal organizational knowledge bases into independent display websites through CMS systems. Suitable for enterprise knowledge bases, product help centers, technical documentation, and other content display scenarios, making knowledge management and content display more efficient.

hero_bg_type.label: Hero Background Style
hero_bg_type.info: After selecting the background style, the background color and image will be displayed according to the selected content

hero_image_url.label: Background Image
hero_image_url.info: Background image will be automatically cropped according to page width and background height

hero_bg_color.label: Background Color
hero_bg_color.info: The color of the hero background style will be processed according to the selected color value (color background)

hero_slogan.label: Slogan
hero_slogan.info: Slogan will be displayed above the background image

search_hot_tags.label: Popular Tags
search_hot_tags.info: After setting, the tag list will be displayed below the homepage search bar

search_hot_keywords.label: Popular Searches
search_hot_keywords.info: After setting, popular searches will be displayed below the search box. Use line breaks to set multiple keywords

video.name: Video Template
video.description: Video page template, used for displaying video content
